title: Very Disappointing
review: I just don't get the hype. It leaves you with a 'That's it?' feeling at the end. The shaky camera can give you motion sickness!This is the first movie for which I ever wanted to get my money back.

title: Overrated
review: This is a good action/war movie. That's it. Spielberg's directing is *too* perfect. It reminds me of a Norman Rockwell painting. Sentiment rather than emotion.
